column4: hey guys I'm having huge issues with my laptop, after a few minutes everything switches to read-only. I ran memtest and it didn't find anything wrong with my memory, is this because the HD is going bad?
why doesn't ubuntu at installation use the i686 kernel when it is a P4 2.8ghz ?
also at boot the ntp.ubuntulinux.org clock syncronize fails ?
I had the same issue, got 686 later.
